attributes.action: For Costa Coffee(and similar) to comply with government decision of closing down
attributes.additional_details: Because is the only way that we have to stop the pandemic. Otherwise all measures will be useless
attributes.background: Costa Coffee is not complying with government decision to close down restaurants, pubs, cafes etc to prevent the spread of covid-19 we need the government to take action and force these companies to close.

rejection.details:
The Government has announced that pubs, clubs and restaurants are to close. 
It has also asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here:  https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can find out more about how to protect yourself and others from coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19

You may wish to know that Costa Coffee has confirmed it has closed its stores: https://www.costa.co.uk/withyou/latest-updates
